name: Simple Dungeon
description:
This is a learning project in Unity, practically, the first project I've finished more or less. The task is to colllect 10 points by picking the bonus objects (the one in for example the cover) and avoding the drones to explode into your face. The momen one senses you it start approaching immediately. You have infinite amount of lightball to shoot them if you notice the chasing drone in time.
